name: Natures Call
description:
Watch out for Nature, as it is slowly disappearing.

As you work your typical 9 to 5 job and are closer than ever to the final burnout, a mystical voice appears in your head.

It must be because I`m crazy you think at first, jet you follow their call and accept that there may be no way back to normal civilization. 

Without much hesitation, you start into your adventure and find a connection that nearly was lost completely.

Controls: Keyboard and Gamepad, further instructions are ingame
